segments.text: I like this apartment . Do you think we can afford the mortgage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I think so . It ’ s not a very expensive apartment . It ’ s in the right area and it has everything that we are looking for . The rooms are quite large too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love the balcony . We can sit outside and enjoy the sun in summer . We are on the 12th floor , so there ’ s very nice view from the balcony .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The neighbourhood is nice too . There is a park nearby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and there are many houses nearby . I like it that the neighbourhood isn ’ t full of apartment blocks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a pity we can ’ t afford a house . A garden would be so nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it would . Don ’ t worry . There ’ s a lawn outside the building and there ’ s the park nearby . This place will be fine .
